EmailTemplate.name: PCC_NorwichOfficeMove
EmailTemplate.subject: We are moving
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Davis Langdon, an AECOM company, is moving into new offices in Norwich
Davis Langdon, an AECOM company, has recently moved into offices in the new business quarter, reinforcing our 67-year presence in Norwich.
The move from Thorpe Road to St James Place on Whitefriars, gives us a modern efficient facility that will meet the needs of our growing team and enable the on-going commitment that AECOM has to delivering world-class services from a local and regional presence. Our AECOM colleagues in Norwich will also be joining us in the new offices.
Our new address is:
3 St James Court Whitefriars Norwich NR3 1RJ
T: +44 (0)1603 302500
Please note: From 1 October, Davis Langdon will be known as AECOM in Europe, the Middle East and the Americas. The change of name reflects the ability of the integrated business to provide local and national clients with the full spectrum of services from feasibility studies to design concepts through to project delivery and asset management.
Please click here for more information about our move
